imdb.plot outline: The World of X Games is a collection of feature-driven shows highlighting and documenting the premier athletes and events that drive the lifestyle and sports at X Games. Content will include X Games Aspen and Austin event previews, athlete and artist profiles, original events, plus in-depth recaps of X Games events and associated partner events.
imdb.title: World of X Games
plot: The _World of X Games_ (qv) is a collection of feature-driven shows highlighting and documenting the premier athletes and events that drive the lifestyle and sports at X Games. Content will include X Games Aspen and Austin event previews, athlete and artist profiles, original events, plus in-depth recaps of X Games events and associated partner events.
